dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice of claimed copyright infringement and software piracy (vnonlines.com)
dmca.body:
en

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, November 19, 2004 10:51 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of claimed copyright infringement and software
piracy (vnonlines.com) Case ID: 8

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


Forwarding to Legal for review.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Copyright <copyright@wiforums.net>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Friday, November 19, 2004, 1:15:26 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice of claimed copyright infringement and software
piracy (vnonlines.com) Case ID: 8

===8<==============Original message text===============
Hello,

CLAIM: Unauthorized use of the following software:

IP Address: 67.19.28.170

WiForums Full Featured 2.0 for vBulletin 3.0 WAP discussion forum "visible
source-code" software.

Copyright issued on 04/22/2003 by the Canadian Intellectual Property Office
(CIPO)

Copyright Registration Number: 1011236

Product URL(s):

- - http://www.WiForums.net

Dear Sir/Madam,

I Thaddeus Clarke Jr., the copyright owner/holder, has determined that the
website listed below, which are located on servers that are under your
control, are intentionally pirating unlicensed a copyrighted copy of
WiForums Full Featured 2.0 for vBulletin 3.0 WAP discussion forum "visible
source-code" software.

The infringing material can be found at the following location(s):

(1) http://vnonlines.com/diendan/chude2673
(2) http://vnonlines.com/diendan/index.vnonlines?act=Attach&type=post&id=381

On 11/19/2004 (GMT -5) I obtained a screenshot of the vnonlines.com web page
which offers/links to the pirated software. You can access this screenshot
here: http://www.WiForums.net/CI/CI_ID8_1.png

The two hundred and twenty-three (223) copyrighted "visible source-code"
files and images which are present in the WiForums Full Featured 2.0 for
vBulletin 3.0 discussion forum software are distributed in a file named
"wiforumsfull2.2_vbb3.rar" (dynamically created file name).  The file is
most likely stored at http://vnonlines.com/diendan/uploads/ with a different
filename*.

*All attachments created by Invision Power Board (what vnonlines.com uses
for as a bulletin board-> they have also pirated this software) are renamed
using their file naming convention), so at the very least delete all of the
attachments in the directory.



I expect that you will take swift action to remove and/or disable access to
the materials described above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction,
distribution, and use of unlicensed software via your company's network.

I attest under penalty of perjury that the foregoing information is
accurate; that I am the copyright owner of the referenced material; that I
believe in good faith that use of the referenced material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner or the law. I further
acknowledge that by making a false claim of infringement, I could be held
liable for damages to the copyright owner of the content that is subject of
this notification.

I appreciate your cooperation in this matter.

Please advise me regarding what actions you may take.

Sincerely,

Thaddeus Clarke Jr.
WiForums.net
Founder & Software Developer

2675 Ste-Helene
Longueuil, Quebec
J4K 3V5
Canada

Email: copyright@wiforums.net
Phone No: (514) 582-9574



===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFBniR5vK/XpJs6oyURAsXGAKCI9VgrEbPDeenSb+PB9TuuahFgUQCeOkBs
7/97ZGmp3A1XHGQPg9Ejtpo=
=dTNL
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
